Attributes.description: Introduction to essential skills for academic and professional work in Asian Studies. Outlines career trajectories in the PhD and beyond, including grant applications, cv-writing, and job searches. Required of Asian Studies PhD students, normally in their first year.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 19:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: B216
